vimalitaṃ nirmalīkṛtaṃ vā rasātalaṃ yena tena | punaḥ kīdṛśam | hariṇā trivikrameṇāpyaprāptatuṅa‍gaśikharam | kīdṛśena | tribhuvanaharaṇāya sarvato bhāvādvardhitena vṛddhiṃ gatena | mṛdnatā mardayatā | atra parvatānubhāvātiśayavivakṣayātiśayaḥ sa ca tairanubhūyamāna eva ||
‘raṇadujjao dahamuho surā avajjhā a tihuaṇassa ime |
paḍaï aṇatthotti phuḍaṃ vihīsaṇena phuḍiāharaṃ ṇīsasiam 225’
[raṇadurjayo daśamukhaḥ surā avadhyāśca tribhuvanasyeme |
patatyanartha iti sphuṭaṃ vibhīṣaṇena sphuṭitādharaṃ niśvasitam ||
atra daśāsyaḥ samare na jīyate, surāścāmaratvānna vadhyante, tayośca parasparaṃ saṃghaṭṭakriyātiśayāttribhuvanamapi kṣayaṃ yāsyatīti yeyamanyonyakriyātiśayabhaṇanāllokasīmātikrameṇa viśeṣavivakṣā so 'yaṃ kriyātiśayo nāmātiśaya evānyonyātiśaya ucyate ||
raṇetyādi | “raṇadurjayo daśamukhaḥ surā avadhyā aho tribhuvanasyāsau | patatyanartha iti sphuṭaṃ vibhīṣaṇena sphuṭitādharaṃ niśvasitam ||” iha sphuṭitādharaṃ vyaktīkṛtādharaṃ yathā syādevaṃ vibhīṣaṇena rāvaṇabhrātrā niśvasitaṃ niśvāsastyaktaḥ sphuṭaṃ vyaktameva | kutaḥ | daśāsyo raṇe durjayaḥ, surā devā amaratvādavadhyāḥ | aho āścaryamasau tribhuvanasyānarthaḥ patatīti | itirhetau | atra daśāsyasurayoranyonyakriyātiśayokteranyonyātiśayaḥ | sakalabhuvanakṣayakāritayā lokasīmātipātaḥ || ityatiśayokt‍yalaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||
śleṣālaṃkāranirūpaṇam |
śleṣaṃ lakṣayati—
śleṣo 'nekārthakathanaṃ padenaikena kathyate |
padakriyākārakaiḥ syādbhinnābhinnaiḥ sa ṣaḍ‍vidhaḥ || 85 ||
śleṣa iti | ekena padena vibhaktyantenānekeṣāmarthānāṃ kathanaṃ yatra sa śleṣaḥ kathyate | ekarūpānvitamanekārthaṃ vacaḥ śleṣa iti lakṣaṇam | sa ca ṣaḍvidhaḥ padādibhiḥ syāt ||
﻿
teṣu bhinnapado yathā—
‘doṣākareṇa ‘rājamārgābhigāminā’ ghasaṃbadhnannakṣatrapathavartinā |
rājñā pradoṣo māmitthamapriyaṃ kiṃ na bādhate || 226 ||’
atra ‘pradoṣo rātreḥ prathamayāmaḥ kimiti priyārahitaṃ māṃ na bādhate’ ityukteryuktimāha—itthamanubhūyamānena prakāreṇa | rājñā saṃbadhnan | kīdṛśena | doṣākareṇa nakṣatrapathavartineti | yo hi doṣāṇāmākareṇa rājamārgātigāminā ca rājñā prakṛṣṭadoṣaḥ saṃbadhyate so 'priyamavaśyaṃ‘so 'pi priyam’ ga bādhata eva; tadatra pūrvasminprākaraṇike 'rthe dvitīyo 'rtho 'prākaraṇikaḥ padabhedenopaśliṣyamāṇo bhinnapadaśleṣāpadeśamāsādayati ||
doṣetyādi | prakṛṣṭo doṣo dūṣaṇaṃ yasya sa durjano māṃ kiṃ na bādhate, kiṃtu bādhata eva | māṃ kīdṛśam | apriyaṃ tasya dveṣyam | kīdṛśaḥ | itthamanubhūyamānena prakāreṇa rājñā bhūpena saha saṃbadhnan yuñjan | ātmānamityadhyāhāryam | atra karmavadbhāvo na kṛtaḥ saṃbadhyamāna ityarthatvāt | rājñā kīdṛśena | doṣāṇāṃ dūṣaṇānāmākareṇa sthānena | kṣatrapathaḥ kṣatriyamārgastatra vartituṃ śīlaṃ yasya tena | paścānnakārasaṃbandhaḥ | kṣatriyadharmaśūnyenetyarthaḥ | pakṣe pradoṣo rajanīmukhaṃ māmapriyaṃ priyārahitaṃ kiṃ na bādhate kiṃtu bādhata eva | kīdṛśaḥ | rājñā candreṇetthaṃ saṃbadhyamānaḥ | kīdṛśena | doṣākareṇa rātrikareṇa | nakṣatrapathaṃ vyoma tadavasthitiśīlena ca | atra rājapadamabhinnam | śeṣapadānāṃ bhedādbhinnapadaśleṣaḥ ||
abhinnapado yathā—
‘asāvudayamārūḍhaḥ kāntimān raktamaṇḍalaḥ |
rājā harati lokasya‘sarvasya’ ga hṛdayaṃ mṛdubhiḥ karaiḥ || 227 ||’
atrāyamudīyamānaścandramā lokasya hṛdayaṃ haratītyukteryuktimāha—rājānuraktamaṇḍala udayī mṛdukaraḥ kāntimāniti | yo hyevaṃbhūto rājā ﻿
so 'vaśyaṃ lokasya hṛdayahārī bhavati | atrāpi ca prākaraṇike 'rthe 'prākaraṇika upaśliṣyamāṇaḥ padānāmabhedenābhinnapadaśleṣo bhavati ||
asāvityādi | asau rājā nṛpo mṛdubhirapīḍākaraiḥ karai rājagrāhyairlokasya hṛdayaṃ harati | kīdṛśaḥ | udayaṃ vṛddhimārūḍhaḥ prāptaḥ | kāntimān śobhāyuktaḥ | raktamanuraktaṃ maṇḍalaṃ deśo yasya saḥ | pakṣe asau rājā candraḥ karaiḥ kiraṇairmṛdubhiḥ śītalairjanasya hṛdayaṃ harati gṛhṇāti | kīdṛśaḥ | udayamudayādrimupagataḥ | kāntimān dīptiyukto raktamaṇḍalo lohitabimbaśca | ‘udayo vṛddhāvudayaparvate’ iti viśvaḥ | 'maṇḍalaṃ bimbadeśayoḥ’ iti ca | atra rājādipadānāmabhedenābhinnapadaśleṣatvam ||
bhinnakriyo yathā—
‘madhurā rāgavardhinyaḥ komalāḥ kokilāgiraḥ |
ākarṇyante madakalāḥ śliṣyante cāsitekṣaṇāḥ || 228 ||’
atra ‘ākarṇyante, śliṣyante ca’ iti kriyāpadadvitayasya prādhānyataḥ samuccayenopāttasya ‘madhurā—’ ityādibhiḥ śliṣṭapadaiḥ ‘kokilāgiraḥ', ‘asitekṣaṇāḥ’ iti vā viśeṣyaikapadavarjaṃ paryāyataḥ saṃbandho bhavati | tadyathā—ākarṇyante | kāḥ | kokilāgiraḥ | kīdṛśyaḥ | madhurāḥ, rāgavardhinyaḥ, komalāḥ | punarapi kiṃbhūtāḥ | āsite upaveśite niścalīkṛte antaḥpramodānubhāvādīkṣaṇe yābhistāstathā | sarvo 'pi hi madhuraṃ śabdamākarṇayan niścalākṣo bhavati | śliṣyante ca | kāḥ | asitekṣaṇāḥ hariṇacakṣuṣaḥ | kiṃbhūtāḥ | madakalāḥ, kokilāgiraḥ, komalāḥ, rāgavardhinyaḥ, madhurā iti | so 'yaṃ dvayorvibhinnakriyayorbhinnārthe‘bhinnārthaikarūpāṇām’ kha ca rūpiṇāṃ padārthānāmupaśleṣo bhinnakriyaḥ śleṣa ucyate ||
madhurā ityādi | kokilāgira ākarṇyante, asitekṣaṇāḥ śyāmanetrāḥ priyānāśliṣyante ca | kīdṛśyaḥ | madhurāḥ śrutisukhā ramyāśca | rāgavardhinyo 'nurāgajanikā ratijanikāśca | komalā manojñā mṛdvaṅa‍gyaśca | madakalā yauvanavasantādikṛta-﻿
madamadhurāḥ | madena madyavikāreṇa kaladhvaniyuktāśca | āsite upaveśite niścalīkṛte 'ntaḥpramodānubhavādīkṣaṇe yābhistāsāṃ madhuraṃ ravamākarṇayanniścalākṣo bhavati | pakṣe 'sitekṣaṇāḥ | kīdṛśyaḥ | kokilānāmiva giro yāsāṃ tāḥ | atra kriyābhedādbhinnakriyatvamitarapadānāmabhinnānāmevārthadvayabodhakatā ||
‘abhinnakriyayoḥ’ gaabhinnakriyo yathā—
‘svabhāvamadhurāḥ snigdhāḥ śaṃsantyo rāgamulbaṇam |
dṛśo dūtyaśca karṣanti kāntābhiḥ preṣitāḥ priyān || 229 ||’
atra ‘karṣanti’ ityetasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ dṛśāṃ dūtīnāṃ ca śliṣṭapadatvenāveśādayamabhinnakriyo nāma śleṣaviśeṣaḥ | prathamayorasya vā ko viśeṣa iti cet | tatraikasyaiva prākaraṇikatvam atra tu dvayorapīti | ayaṃ ca bhinnakārako 'pi bhavati ||
svabhāvetyādi | kāntābhiḥ preṣitā dṛśo dūtyaśca priyān vallabhān karṣanti | kīdṛśyaḥ | svabhāvena sahajena madhurā lalitāḥ | taduktaṃ matsaṃgītasarvasve—'madhurā kuñcitāntā ca sabhrūkṣepā ca sasmitā | samanmathavikārā ca dṛṣṭiḥ sā lalitā matā ||’ iti | snigdhāḥ snehavatyaḥ | ulbaṇamadhikaṃ rāgaṃ lauhityaṃ śaṃsantyaḥ | pakṣe sahajamadhurāḥ | yadvā svabhāvātpriyavādinyaḥ snigdhā ātmīyāḥ | adhikaṃ rāgaṃ madyavikārakṛtaṃ śaṃsantyaḥ | yadvā rāgamanurāgaṃ kathayantyaḥ | atra priyākarṣaṇarūpaikaiva kriyā sādhāraṇītyekakriyātvam | bhinnapadābhinnapadābhyāmasya ca ko bheda iti pṛcchati—prathamayoriti | vāśabdaścārthe | uttaram—tatreti | tayorekaikasyaiva prakaraṇāpannatvamatra tu dṛṣṭaṃ dva‍yorapi prākaraṇikatvamiti bheda ityarthaḥ | anekakartṛkatvenāyaṃ bhinnakārakodāharaṇamapītyāha—ayamiti ||
bhinnakārako yathā—
‘gatirveṇī ca nāgena vapurūrū ca rambhayā |
oṣṭhau pāṇī pravālaiśca tasyāstulyatvamāyayuḥ || 230 ||
atraikasmin pakṣe dharmadharmiṇorabhedopacārānnāgagatirgṛhyate | tatra gate-﻿
rveṇyāśca nāgena hastinā ahinā ca tulyatvam, vapuṣa ūrvośca rambhayā kadalyā apsarobhiśca tulyatvam, oṣṭhayoḥ pāṇyośca pravālairvidrumairnavapallavaiśca ‘tulyatvam’ ka kha gatulyatvaṃ varṇanīyayoḥ śleṣaprabhāvāllabhyate; so 'yamanekakartṛkatvādbhinnakāraka iti śleṣo bhavati ||
gatirityādi | tasyā nāyikāyā gatirgamanaṃ veṇī keśaracanā ca nāgena hastinā sarpeṇa ca, tasyā vapurūrudvayaṃ ca rambhayā 'psarobhedena kadalyā ca, tasyāḥ pāṇī hastāvoṣṭhau ca pravālairvidrumaiḥ pallavaiśca sarvāṇi tulyatvamāyayuḥ | ‘nāgo hastibhujaṅa‍gayoḥ’ iti śāśvataḥ | ‘kadalyapsaraso rambhā’ iti ca | ‘pallave vidrume cāpi pravālaḥ’ iti dharaṇiḥ | gatinānātvādāha—dharmeti | atra nānākartṛkatvādeva bhinnakārakatā ||
abhinnakārako yathā—
‘kṛṣṇārjunānuraktāpi dṛṣṭiḥ karṇāvalambinī |
yāti viśvasanīyatvaṃ kasya te kalabhāṣiṇi || 231 ||’
atra ‘he kalabhāṣiṇi, kasya te dṛṣṭirviśvāsyā bhavati’ ityukteryuktimāha—‘kṛṣṇārjunānuraktāpi karṇāvalambinī’ iti ca | yā hi kṛṣṇārjunenānurajyate kathaṃ sā karṇapakṣapātinī bhavati, yā caivamubhayagatā tasyāṃ ko viśvasiti; sa cāyamekakartṛkatvādabhinnakāraka iti śleṣo bhavati ||
kṛṣṇetyādi | he kalabhāṣiṇi madhuravacane, tava dṛṣṭiḥ kasya viśvasanīyatvaṃ viśvāsaviṣayatāṃ yāti kiṃtu na kasyāpi | atra hetuḥ kṛṣṇā śyāmā, arjunā dhavalā, anuraktā prāntalohitā ca | prādeśiko 'yaṃ kramaḥ | karṇaparyantagāminī ca | pakṣe kṛṣṇe harau, arjune pārthe cānuraktānurāgavatī karṇapakṣapātinī ca yā sā viruddhobhayagatā kathaṃ viśvasanīyā bhavati | ‘valakṣo dhavalo 'rjunaḥ’ ityamaraḥ | atra karturekatayābhinnakārakatā || iti śleṣālaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||
bhāvikālaṃkāranirūpaṇam |
bhāvanālakṣaṇamāha—
svābhiprāyasya kathanaṃ yadi vāpyanyabhāvanā |
anyāpadeśo vā yastu trividhaṃ bhāvikaṃ viduḥ || 86 ||
﻿
mate cāsmākamudbhedo vidyate naiva bhāvikāt |
vyaktāvyaktobhayākhyābhistrividhaḥ so 'pi kathyate || 87 ||
svetyādi | nijāśayakathanamanyakathanamanyāpadeśaśca bhāvikam | bhāve kaverabhiprāye bhavaṃ bhāvikamityanvarthanāmatāpi | udbhedabhāvikayorabhedamāha—mata iti | so 'pi udbhedo 'pi ||
tatra bhāvikabhedeṣu svābhiprāyakathanaṃ yathā—
‘ṇāvajjhaï duggejjhiā diṭṭhammi jammi bhiuḍiā jattha ṇa avvāhārao ghippaï āhāsattae |
vicchuhaï ahiṇiṃdae jattha ṇa so vaaṃsiā taṃ me ‘kahahu’ ka kha gakahaü māṇaaṃ jaï me icchahi ‘jīiam’ iti ghajīaam || 232 ||
[nābadhyate durgṛhītā dṛṣṭe yasmin bhṛkuṭikā yatra nāvyāhāro gṛhyate ābhāṣamāṇe |
vikṣubhyate 'bhinindyate yatra na sa vayasyayā taṃ me kathaya mānaṃ yadi me icchasi jīvanam ||]
atra ‘bhrūdbhedā’ khabhrūbhedāsaṃbhāṣaṇapriyatamāvakṣepān pratyanabhimatapratipādanarūpasyābhiprāyasya kathitatvādidaṃ svābhiprāyakathanaṃ nāma bhāvikam ||
ṇāvajjaï ityādi | “nābadhyate durgrāhyā dṛṣṭe yasmin bhrukuṭikā yatra na ca (cā) vyāhāro gṛhyate ābhāṣamāṇe | vikṣubhyate 'bhinīyamāne yatra na sa vayasyayā taṃ me kathaya mānaṃ yadi me icchasi jīvitam ||” iha yasmin dṛṣṭe durgrahā bhrukuṭirnābadhyate samantānna badhyate yatrābhāṣamāṇe 'vyāhāro na ca gṛhyate | yatrābhinīyamāne vayasyayā sa na kṣubhyate taṃ mānaṃ mama kathaya yadi mama jīvanamicchasi | atrānākāṅkṣitarūpasyābhiprāyasya kathanam ||
﻿
anyabhāvanā yathā—
‘daṃsaṇavaliaṃ daḍhakaṃ vibandhaṇaṃ dīharaṃ supariṇāham |
hoi ghare sāhīṇaṃ musalaṃ dhaṇṇāṇaṃ mahilāṇam || 233 ||’
[daṃśanavalitaṃ dṛḍhakaṃ vibandhanaṃ dīrdhaṃ supariṇāham |
bhavati gṛhe svādhīnaṃ musalaṃ dhanyānāṃ mahilānām ||]
atra mẹdhrabhāvanayā musalarūpasyoktatvādidamanyabhāvanābhidhānaṃ bhāvikam ||
daṃsaṇetyādi | “daṃśanena valitaṃ dṛḍhakaṃ vibandhanaṃ dīrghaṃ supariṇāham | bhavati gṛhe svādhīnaṃ musalaṃ dhanyānāṃ mahilānām ||” ihottamastrīṇāṃ gṛhe īdṛśaṃ musalaṃ svāyattaṃ bhavati | kīdṛśam | daṃśane dhānyādimardane valitaṃ lagnam | dṛḍhakaṃ dṛḍham | svārthe kan | vigatabandhanaṃ dīrghaṃ supariṇāhamatisthūlaṃ ca | mẹdhrapakṣe daṃśane bhagamardane valitaṃ saṃnaddhaṃ dṛḍhaṃ vigatabandhanaṃ dīrghamatisthūlaṃ ca | atra mẹdhrābhiprāyeṇa musalokteranyabhāvanā ||
anyāpadeśo yathā—
‘āsāiamaṇṇāeṇa jettiaṃ‘jittiam’ ga gha tettiaṃ cia vihiṇam |
oramasu vasaha eṇhiṃ rakkhijjaï gahavaïcchettam || 234 ||’
[āsvāditamajñātena yāvattāvadeva vrīhīṇām |
uparama vṛṣabhedānīṃ rakṣyate gṛhapatikṣetram ||]
atra parakṣetrasya ghasmaravṛṣanivāraṇāpadeśena cirātparijñāta ‘vāryate’ ka khaupapatirnivāryate, tadidamanyāpadeśākhyaṃ bhāvikam ||
āsāia ityādi | “āsvāditamajñātena yāvattāvataiva bandhaya dhṛtim | uparamasva vṛṣabhātra rakṣayitvā gṛhapatikṣetram ||” iha he vṛṣabha, gṛhapatikṣetraṃ rakṣayitvā tvamuparamasva krīḍaya | ajñātena tvayā yāvadevāsvāditaṃ tāvataiva dhṛtiṃ bandhaya | atra vṛṣabhanivāraṇavyājenopapatinivāraṇamanyāpadeśaḥ ||
﻿
udbhedeṣu vyakto yathā—
‘maṃtesi mahumahapaṇaaṃ saṃdāṇesi tiasesapāavaraaṇam |
ojasu ‘suddha’ iti pāṭhaḥ.muddhasuhāvaṃ saṃbhāvesu suraṇāha jāavaloam‘jā ava’ kha ga || 235 ||’
[manuṣe madhumathapraṇayaṃ saṃdānayasi tridaśeśapādaparatnam |
apajahi mugdhasvabhāvaṃ saṃbhāvaya suranātha yādavalokam ||]
atra māyāvino mahendrasyābhiprāyaḥ satyakena vyaktamevodbhinna iti vyakto 'yamudbhedaḥ ||
mantesītyādi | “manuṣe madhumathapraṇayaṃ saṃdānayasi tridaśeśa pādaparatnam | apajahi mugdhasvabhāvaṃ saṃbhāvaya suranātha yādavalokam ||” iha he suranātha indra, yadi madhumathasya kṛṣṇasya praṇayaṃ prītiṃ manuṣe svīkaroṣi | deve pādaparatnaṃ pārijātavṛkṣaṃ saṃdadāne sati mugdhaṃ svabhāvaṃ maugdhyamapajahi tyaja | yādavalokaṃ saṃbhāvaya prīṇaya | atrendrābhiprāyaḥ satyakena tatsārathinā vyaktaḥ prakāśitaḥ ||
avyakto yathā—
‘niḥśeṣacyutacandanaṃ stanataṭaṃ nirmṛṣṭarāgo 'dharo netre dūramanañjane pulakitā tanvī taveyaṃ tanuḥ |
mithyāvādini dūti bāndhavajanasyājñātapīḍāgame‘pīḍāgamā’ ka. kha. vāpīṃ snātumito gatāsi na punastasyādhamasyāntikam || 236 ||’
atra ‘vāpīṃ snātumito gatāsi na punastasyādhamasyāntikam’ ityākṣepavatā ‘prakṛtodāharaṇena’ ka khaprākaraṇikodāharaṇena yadyapi dūtyā duśceṣṭitaṃ nirbhinnaṃ tathāpi na pūrvavavdyaktamityavyakto 'yamudbhedaḥ ||
niḥśeṣetyādi | he dūti, itaḥ sthānāttvaṃ vāpīṃ puṣkariṇīṃ snātuṃ gatāsi | tasyādhamasyāntikaṃ na gatāsi | he mithyāvādini, he suhṛjjanasyājñātaduḥkhāgame | snānacihnānyāha—stanataṭaṃ niḥśeṣacyutacandanamaśeṣakṣaritacandanamasti | tavādharo 'pi tyaktalauhityaḥ | tava netre 'tyarthamañjanaśūnye | tathā taveyaṃ tanvī kṛśā tanuḥ ﻿
śarīraṃ pulakitā romāñcavatī ca | atra snānasaṃbhogayostulyacihnasyopadarśanena prakaraṇapariprāptaṃ dūtīduśceṣṭitamudbhinnam, na ca prāgvavdyaktatā ||
ubhayarūpo yathā—
‘amlānotpalakomale sakhi dṛśau nīlāñjanenāñcite karpūracchuraṇācca gaṇḍaphalake saṃvellitaḥ‘na punastasyādhamasyāntikam’ ka kha pāṇḍimā |
śvāsāḥ santu ca kandukabhramibhuvaḥ kiṃtu prabhāvāhinā- maṅa‍gānāṃ kraśimānamutkaṭamamuṃ ko nāma notprekṣate || 237 ||’
atra ‘dṛśormlānatā, gaṇḍayoḥ pāṇḍuratvam, śvāsānāṃ dairdhyam’ ityutkaṇṭhācihnanihnavāya yo 'yamavinayavatyā nīlāñjanādiprayogastasya ‘tattvābhyupagame 'pi’ ka khatathābhyupagame 'pi ‘aṅa‍gānāṃ kraśimānamutkaṭamamuṃ ko nāma notprekṣate’ iti yo 'yaṃ sakhīvyāhārastena tadabhiprāya udbhinno 'nudbhinnaśca bhavatītyubhayarūpo 'yamudbhedaḥ | te 'mī trayo 'pyudbhedā bhāvikānna bhidyante ||
amlānetyādi | kiṃtu he sakhi, tavāṅa‍gānāmamumudbhaṭaṃ kraśimānaṃ kṛśatvaṃ ko na nāmotprekṣate kiṃtūnnayata eva | yadyapi tava dṛśāvamlāne mlānihīne utpanne iva komale manojñe staḥ | kīdṛśe | nīlakajjalenāñcite | yataḥ karpūrasya churaṇāt saṃbandhāt pāṇḍimā pāṇḍuratvaṃ gaṇḍaphalake saṃvellitaḥ saṃbaddhaḥ | śvāsāśca kandukakrīḍanārthaṃ yā bhramirbhramaṇaṃ tatprabhavāḥ santu | aṅa‍gānāṃ kīdṛśānām | prabhāvāhināṃ prabhāṃ dīptiṃ vọdhuṃ dhartuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ teṣām | sahajaramyāṇāmityarthaḥ | avinayavatyā asatyāḥ | atrāvinayavatyā āśayaḥ kiṃcivdyaktīkṛtaḥ | kiṃciccāvyaktīkṛta ityubhayarūpatā || iti bhāvikālaṃkāranirūpaṇam ||
saṃsṛṣṭyalaṃkāranirūpaṇam |
saṃsṛṣṭilakṣaṇamāha—
saṃsṛṣṭiriti vijñeyā nānālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ‘sarvālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ’ ka kha |
sā tu vyaktā tathāvyaktā vyaktāvyakteti ca tridhā || 88 ||
﻿
tilataṇḍulavavdyaktā chāyādarśavadeva ca |
avyaktā kṣīrajalavatpāṃsupānīyavacca‘pāṃśupānīyavacca sā’ pāṭhaḥ sā || 89 ||
vyaktāvyaktā ca saṃsṛṣṭirnarasiṃhavadiṣyate |
citravarṇavadanyasminnānālaṃkārasaṃkare || 90 ||
saṃsṛṣṭiriti | nānālaṃkārāṇāṃ saṃkaro 'pi......saṃsṛṣṭiḥ | chāyeti | pratibimbadarpaṇavadityarthaḥ | kṣīraṃ dugdham | pāṃsurdhūliḥ | citreti | citralikhitavarṇikāvadityarthaḥ ||
vyaktā tilataṇḍulavadyathā—
‘pinaṣṭīva taraṅa‍gāgrairudaghiḥ phenacandanam |
tadādāya karairindurlimpatīva digaṅa‍ganāḥ || 238 ||’
atrotprekṣādva‍yam, rūpakadva‍yaṃ ca tilataṇḍulavatsaṃkīryate ||
pinaṣṭītyādi | samudrastaraṅa‍gāgraiḥ phenacandanaṃ pinaṣṭīva | induḥ karaistadādāya digaṅa‍ganā limpatīva | atrevaśabdābhyāmutprekṣādva‍yam | phena eva candanam, diśa evāṅa‍ganā iti rūpakadva‍yam | tadidaṃ miśritaṃ tilataṇḍulavat | yathā tilānāṃ taṇḍulānāṃ ca mitho nirapekṣāṇāmeva saṃkīrṇatā tathātrāpi ||
vyaktaiva chāyādarśavadyathā—
‘nirmalendu nabho reje vikacābjaṃ babhau saraḥ |
paraṃ paryaśrunayanau mamlaturbhrātarāvubhau || 239 ||’
atrādarśe‘atrādarśacchāyeva’ kha chāyeva hetvalaṃkāre rāmalakṣmaṇamukhayorindupadmaupamyena sadṛśāsadṛśavyatireko dṛśyate ||
nirmaletyādi | vivṛto 'yaṃ vyatirekālaṃkāre | atra pūrvārdhena hetvalaṃkāre darśite tadādhāraka eva sadṛśāsadṛśayorvyatirekaḥ | sa ca darpaṇe pratibimba ivādhārādheyabhāvena vyavasthāpitaḥ ||
﻿
avyaktā kṣīrajalavadyathā—
‘kṣīrakṣālitacandreva nīlīdhautāmbareva ca |
ṭaṅa‍kollikhitasūryeva vasantaśrīradṛśyata || 240 ||’
atropamotprekṣe kṣīranīravanmiśre saṃsṛṣṭe na vyajyete ||
kṣīretyādi | vasantaśrīrvasantaśobhā 'dṛśyata janaiḥ | kīdṛśī | kṣīreṇa dugdhena kṣālitaścandro yasyāṃ sā | nīlīdravyena dhautaṃ kṣālitamambaramākāśaṃ yasyāṃ sā | ṭaṅa‍kena pāṣāṇadāraṇenollikhita utkhaṇḍitaḥ sūryo yasyāṃ sā | ‘ṭaṅa‍kaḥ pāṣāṇadāraṇaḥ’ ityamaraḥ | atropamotprekṣayormitho milanādavyaktatā | ubhayavyañjakasya tulyakakṣatayā pravṛtteridaṃ boddhavyam ||
avyaktaiva pāṃsūdakavadyathā—
‘kṛṣṇārjunānuraktāpi dṛṣṭiḥ karṇāvalambinī |
yāti viśvasanīyatvaṃ kasya te kalabhāṣiṇi || 241 ||’
atra pāṃsūdakayoriva mṛtpiṇḍe‘mṛtpiṇḍaśleṣavirodhayoḥ’ gha śleṣavirodhayoravyaktayoreva vyājastutāvaṅa‍gabhāvo 'vagamyate ||
kṛṣṇetyādi | vivṛto 'yaṃ bhāvikālaṃkāre | atra yathā mṛttikāpiṇḍe dhūlijalayormitho milanādavyaktatā tathā śleṣavirodhayorvyājastutiprasaṅa‍gataḥ saṃkara ||
vyaktāvyaktā narasiṃhavadyathā—
‘rajobhisturagotkīrṇairgajaiśca ghanasaṃnibhaiḥ |
bhuvastalamiva vyoma kurvanvyomeva bhūtalam || 242 ||’
atra narasiṃhajātāviva siṃhanaraśarīrabhāgayoḥ parivṛttyalaṃkārahetūpamayoraṅa‍gabhāvo vyaktāvyaktarūpaḥ parisphurannupalabhyate ||
rajobhirityādi | sa kīdṛśaḥ | hayakhurakṣuṇṇai rajobhirmeghatulyairhastibhiśca gaganaṃ ﻿
bhūtalamiva, bhūtalaṃ gaganatalamiva kurvan | atra yathā narasiṃhajātau siṃhanarāṅa‍gabhāgayorvyaktāvyaktarūpaṃ sphuraṇaṃ tathā parivṛttyalaṃkāre hetūpamayoraṅa‍gabhāvo vyaktāvyaktarūpaḥ ||
vyaktāvyaktaiva citravarṇavadyathā—
‘‘mayūrārāvamukharā’ gamayūrārāvamukharāṃ prāvṛṣaṃ sataḍillatām |
mahāṭavīmivollaṅa‍ghya toyāni mumucurghanāḥ || 243 ||’
atra paṭāvayavasthānāṃ nīlādīnāmiva paṭāvayavyāśrite citravarṇe śleṣarūpakopamārthaśleṣāṇāṃ padapadārthāśrayāṇāṃ śaradvarṇanavākyāśrayiṇi samādhyalaṃkāre vyaktāvyaktarūpo 'ṅa‍gaṅgibhāvaḥ pratīyate ||
mayūretyādi | meghā jalāni tyajanti sma | mahāṭavīṃ mahāraṇyamiva prāvṛṣaṃ varṣā ullaṅa‍ghya | kīdṛśīm | mayūraśabdamukharāṃ, saha taḍiteva latayā vartate tām | atrāvayavāśritanīlādīnāmavayavyāśrite citravarṇe yathāṅa‍gaṅ‍gibhāvastathā śleṣādīnāṃ samādhyalaṃkāre vyaktāvyaktarūpo 'ṅa‍gāṅgibhāvaḥ pratīyata iti ||
caturviṃśatirityetāḥ krameṇobhayasaṃśrayāḥ |
kāvyālaṃkṛtayaḥ proktā yathāvadupamādayaḥ || 91 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇe ubhayālaṃkāravivecano nāma caturthaḥ paricchedaḥ ||
caturviṃśatiriti | ityanena prakāreṇa caturviṃśatiretā upamādayaḥ kāvyālaṃkṛtaya uktā ityanvayaḥ | ajahalliṅa‍gatātra || ubhayeti | śabdārthāśritā ityarthaḥ ||
ratnaṃ ratnadharo 'janiṣṭa guṇināmādyo 'navadyaḥ satāṃ sā śuddhā damayantikāpi suṣuve naiyāyikaṃ yaṃ sutam |
tasya śrīśajagaddharasya kaviturvāṇīgaṇā(lā)laṃkṛte- ṣṭīkāyāmubhayaprakāśanaparicchedaścaturtho gataḥ ||
iti mahāmahopādhyāyadharmādhikaraṇikaśrījagaddharaviracite sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇavivaraṇe caturthaḥ paricchedaḥ ||
